response.overview: Jackson Hole, Wyoming's homegrown movie-house, Storm Show Studios celebrates their 15th anniversary ski/ride/adrenaline film with "Cliff Hanger"!  Destined to become another classic Jackson Hole ski film from veteran producer Darrell Miller.  Featuring your favorite longtime stuntmen & women including Derek Depiero, Rajat Bhayani, Jason Elms, Rob Kingwill, Dave Van Ham, Halina Boyd, Kelly Halpin, Randy Shacket, Daniel Tisi, Sam Schwartz, Forrest Jillson,and many other ripping shredders.  Highlights include harrowing first ski descents in the Jackson Hole backcountry, major peaks of the Teton Range, neck-deep powder in Hakuba, Japan, and Wind River's Gannet Peak, the highest peak in Wyoming!
response.tagline: Jackson Hole, Wyoming's homegrown movie-house, Storm Show Studios celebrates their 15th anniversary ski/ride/adrenaline film with "Cliff Hanger"! Destined to become another classic Jackson Hole ski film from veteran producer Darrell Miller.
response.title: Cliff Hanger
